name: COPD_T1 - AFG
description: Increase excise taxes and prices on tobacco products - AFG

name: CR2 - AFG
description: Acute treatment of COPD exacerbations with inhaled bronchodilators and oral steroids - AFG

name: CR4 - AFG
description: Long-term management of COPD with inhaled bronchodilator - AFG

name: COPD_T2 - AFG
description: Implement plain/standardized packaging and/or large graphic health warnings on all tobacco packages - AFG

name: COPD_T3 - AFG
description: Enact and enforce comprehensive bans on tobacco advertising, promotion and sponsorship - AFG

name: COPD_T6 - AFG
description: Provision of cost-covered effective population-wide support (including brief advice, national toll-free quit line services and mCessation) for tobacco cessation to all tobacco users - AFG

name: COPD_T7 - AFG
description: Provision of cost-covered effective pharmacological interventions to all tobacco users who want to quit - AFG

name: COPD_T4 - AFG
description: Eliminate exposure to second-hand tobacco smoke in all indoor workplaces, public places, public transport - AFG

name: COPD_T5 - AFG
description: Implement effective mass media campaigns that educate the public about the harms of smoking/tobacco use and second-hand smoke - AFG
